projects.name: Mango & Lola Wedding
projects.description: I managed to land a job and be currently employed as a full stack software developer at Mango & Lola. I am a part of an amazing team where I have the ability to learn new technologies and further improve my development skills. Together we are building amazing platform for weddings that you can check out on a website link provided with this project.

projects.name: AtlantBH Internship 23-24
projects.description: I was able to participate in AtlantBH internship as a UX & UI Designer and learn about design process, where I was mentored by amazing individuals who helped me improve my design skills. I was able to work on two different designs, mobile transport application and auction application for web platform.

projects.name: RUBICON Summer Internship 2023
projects.description: Summer after graduation, I was accepted to the RUBICON Summer Internship 2023 Program, to work on a "real" project (more information soon). I was able to work on a, soon to be live, project with a group of an amazing individuals with some of the top-line mentors helping me improve my skills.

projects.name: Dokumenta
projects.description: This project was done for the purpose of Good Hackathon that was organised by telemach foundation. My team and I were able to create fully functional application using NextJS, NodeJS and PostgreSQL. The main purpose of our application was to make easier and more convenient way of acquiring documents from municipality without having to wait in lines for several hours.

projects.name: Sportnet
projects.description: This project is showcasing my undergraduate thesis work on Progressive Web Applications. This project currently in development, more info soon! I was able to create a fully working prototype of a social-media platform for sport enthusiasts using ReactJS for frontend, NodeJS with Express for backend and PostgreeSQL for database.
